rules_text:
When Desperate Botanist enters, create a 0/1 green Plant creature token with “{T}: Add {G}.”
{5}{G}: Transform Desperate Botanist. Activate only if it's attacking.
flavor_text: [i]He seeks a cure for his affliction, fearing what he may do to others . . .[/i]
rules_text2: At the beginning of your end step, if Bramblemane didn't attack this turn, transform it.
flavor_text2: [i]. . . but even the pure at heart go putrid when the wolfbane blooms.[/i]
